Description:
Under Offer
The Secret Garden (1600sqm approx)
This immaculate log cabin is situated in a sought after pocket with all the peace and quiet a country abode would have. On a large allotment of 1600sqm (approx) and a unique feel you couldn't replicate makes this hidden gem well suited to all families, young couples, investors and anyone after that country feel. Comprising: 3 bedrooms, central bathroom, open plan kitchen, meals and lounge, laundry, 3 deck areas to enjoy the serenity, large storage shed, garden shed, car port, huge yard and dual car access ideal for a boat or caravan. Special features include: gas log fire, spilt system, loads of natural light, sky light, multiple water tanks and subdivision potential. Close to schools, shops, public transport, beaches, wineries and easy freeway access.

Description:
Under Offer!
House Sized Unit in Gated Community!
Well presented, spacious and framed by a magical garden emblazoned with a profusion of colour and fragrance, there's absolutely nothing to do but move in and enjoy this quality, low-maintenance home that offers a lifestyle of comfort and convenience.
This well-maintained residence located in a gated community feels like a full-sized home in every sense of the word, featuring a formal living area with a separate family/meals area serviced by a well-presented kitchen comprising a dishwasher, ample bench and cupboard space.
The master offers uncompromising comfort with walk-in-robe and full en-suite, whilst the additional bedrooms are of good size and are conveniently positioned close to the light and bright tiled bathroom and adjoining toilet. A split system AC is positioned in the living room and bedrooms 2 and 3 include built in robes.
Step outside to the paved area designed for seasonal entertaining and relaxation, all in the comfort of your own private courtyard, furthermore, the home guarantees a lifestyle designed to pamper with inclusions such as; arresting front porch, large laundry with plenty of cupboard space, gas ducted heating, remote double garage with internal access to rear, as well as off-street parking for guests.
Whether you're an investor, first-home buyer, retiree or empty nester, you'll enjoy living within easy walking distance to the all local amenities and just a short drive to some of the peninsulas best restaurants and wineries.
A home like this is hard to find and impossible to forget. An immediate inspection is paramount to avoid missing out.

Description:
Under Offer
Timeless Sophistication in Rural Setting
If you are looking for a quality four bedroom plus study home in a quiet tranquil location, close to quality schools and shopping precincts, then look no further! This home offers one of the best family floor plans out there.
Meticulously maintained, this beautifully presented home accentuates the best in modern living. With ducted heating and two x split systems this home will appeal to the most discerning buyer. Substance, size and sophistication are the benchmark when it comes to this family designed home positioned on approx. 1200m2.
Formal lounge with bay window and adjoining dining room offers a beautiful subtle touch of class. Separate huge open plan family/meals area off light filled fully appointed kitchen with island bench offers both casual and informal entertaining at its best. The neutral tones with a splash of colour add to the relaxed ambience offering a low maintenance easy living lifestyle.
The large master (separate to remaining bedrooms) showcases walk in robe and en suite, with the second and third bedrooms showcasing a WIR and fourth with double robe. With two separate living zones, this home is perfect for the family with teenage kids or someone just wanting their own space!
Entertain year round with the large covered outdoor pergola that overlooks landscaped gardens and double garage under roofline with rear yard access making this home perfect for the caravan enthusiast or to store trailer, boat etc.
Properties in this prime country lifestyle location are currently being snapped up so be quick to inspect and make this much loved home yours. In close proximity to schools, transport, Monash Freeway and Eastlink, shops, beaches, vibrant cafes, this home ticks all the boxes for couples or families alike.

FIRST HOME BUYERS!
Brand new - Close To Boat Ramp & shops

Also featuring pebble paving & well fenced low maintenance back yard, ideal for busy professionals & tenants. Minimum 5% return for investors. Vendor has a genuine need to sell & will meet the market. Contact Exclusive Agent Ken Brown on 0402 868 368 for further details.

Description:
Under Offer
Vendor says 'Sell'
This fantastic family home offers everything you could want, from excellent location in quiet cul-de-sac, through to being located close to all amenities.
Main lounge offers cosy gas coonara and great open living with large kitchen / meals area and under cover fully paved entertaining area off meals area, making this the ideal home for all seasons. Comprising 3 bedrooms with built in robes and main bathroom with separate toilet. The home would be well suited to first home buyers, astute investors, couples wanting to downsize or families after that perfect peaceful location.
The property offers side access for a trailer / boat or caravan and a great sized back yard for the kids to play. Located in a well sought after pocket of Crib Point, this home is within easy distance to the local General Store, Railway Station / Bus, Sporting Grounds & Freeways, making this the ideal property.
This one won't last long!

Description:
Timberline Cottage
Oozing character internally and externally, Timberline is a very well presented cute cedar weatherboard cottage that is sure to impress.
Nestled at the end of the street with a stunning street appeal behind the white picket fence. From here you will be drawn to the entrance that is protected by the shading verandah from where you overlook and appreciate the beautiful setting and cottage garden.
Step inside and absorb the character home, timber features, high ceilings, and enjoy the private outlook to the front garden and the very private rear undercover alfresco area that is framed by more garden.
If you are looking for a home with something special to offer, you have found exactly that here in Timberline on approximately 700m2. This outstanding property also features dual vehicle access to the leafy front yard.
Internal features also include open plan living, cathedral ceilings, timber kitchen, separate toilet, semi ensuite with a relaxing spa bath, and a master bedroom with French Windows to the private rear undercover decked area.
The character kitchen with slate floor is filled with natural light and also includes a quality free standing stainless steel oven and cooktop, dishwasher and timber cupboards with ample bench space.
The home has split systems providing heating and cooling as well as additional gas heating.
Your inspection of this comfortable and appealing cottage home is highly recommended.

Description:
A Semi-Rural Family Lifestyle (1226m2 approx)
This comfortable family home positioned on a large allotment (1226m2 approx) could be the ideal place for your family to enjoy a taste of that rural feel without the work and expense of acreage.
The home itself features 4 bedrooms, master with a modern full ensuite and walk in robe, the remaining bedrooms all have BIRs. There is a large lounge room and separate dining room and gas ducted heating throughout. A central kitchen is the heart of the home and overlooks the family room with split system heating and cooling and access to the undercover outdoor entertaining area.
Outside this property is set up with everything you could want; a great workshop/garage with concrete and power, chicken coup, veggie garden, 27,000L in water tanks, solar power and a double carport plus gated rear access to make any vehicle storage requirements easy.

Popular entry level property. New Price

Presentation Perfect on a Quarter Acre

The modern kitchen with plenty of cupboard and bench space overlooks the open meals area and through to the generous living room with air conditioner. Under the house roof line is a brick drive through garage and workshop with two additional doors providing access to the park like rear open space (1104m2 approx).

Description:
Lovely Character and Charm
This circa 1950's home is a great buy, situated in a nice quiet street and offering three good size bedrooms, family bathroom, updated kitchen, lounge and spacious laundry. The home has new ducted heating and a new hot water service as well as recently installed electric gates.
Other lovely features are hard wood floors, decorative cornices and emu wire fence.
Outside is an undercover bricked area with special 1956 Olympic bricks and a garden shed.
This is a great buy for first home buyers or as an investment property.

Description:
Under Offer
New Exclusive Three Bedroom!
One of only three and brilliantly located to all that Crib Point offers, this quality single storey residence offers spacious low maintenance living.
Built by a local and very proud builder the quality home includes upgrades such as European appliances, high ceilings, large kitchens and is bigger than a lot of three bedroom homes. Downsize into a quality unit... for very little more then competing properties.
Set in a quiet yet central position this brand new three bedroom home has 'winner' written all over it. A modern interior hallmarks the ideal response to first home buyer, investor or downsizer requirements designed to reflect the latest in contemporary style.
A generous open-plan living and dining zone, with modern kitchen and quality Blanco stainless steel appliances opening out to your courtyard, while the good-sized main bedroom with ensuite. Two further bedrooms share a deluxe central bathroom.
Additional features include ducted heating, double remote lock up garage, down lights, polished floorboards, water tank and pump, conveniently located within easy reach of schools, local shops and the Crib Point train station.
Call Jason Dowler today on 0403 598 754 to arrange your private inspection or for more information.

Description:
CHEAPEST HOUSE IN CRIB POINT!!
"MEANDER INN" This well presented very affordable B/V with hardiplank facade home will tempt any astute buyer. The home features two spacious bedrooms all with built in robes, lounge/meals area adjoins the timber kitchen with gas chef stove; heating and cooling have been taken care of with R/V cycle air conditioning and a gas log fire in the lounge room, surrounded by a unique mantle piece. Outside boasts a single carport, two garden sheds, variety of fruit trees, vegetable patch and paved BBQ area, plus a lovely private outdoor area which is accessible from the laundry. This well maintained home situated on approx 672sqm corner allotment surrounded by manicured gardens, presents beautifully and is full of natural light. Description:
"FAMILY HOME IN A QUIET COURT LOCATION SET ON 803M2 ALLOTMENT"
Set in a quiet court location adjacent to a reserve and a short walk to the Primary Schools, Recreation Centre and Jacks Beach this home will appeal to the growing family. Featuring four generous sized bedrooms, master has W.I.R and ensuite. This home has recently had a very large extension built that is still under builder's warranty which consists of a near new kitchen, with all modern appliances, walk in pantry and ample overhead cupboards. The large family room which faces north has lovely Tasmanian oak flooring, plus feature wall with built in bookcase and shelving. Also facing north is the enclosed deck area that accesses the large family/meals area and kitchen; this area is a highlight of the home that looks out to the reserve and the various fruit trees established on this large 803m2 allotment. Also boasting a carport and plenty of room for a workshop to house the boy's toys. A Must See to Appreciate! Contact Exclusive Agent Wilma Green on 0407 833 996.

Description:
Potential, potential, potential but bring your tool belt
Situated on a large 1,520m2 approx. allotment, with the potential to subdivide (STCA), this three storey, four bedroom home boasts master with walk in robe and ensuite complete with his and her basins and dual shower. The bottom floor has an under stair office with storage and opens up to a large open lounge and meals area that flows into the industrial-style kitchen with caesar stone bench tops, dishwasher, built in coffee machine, deep sinks and large 8 burner stove with double oven.
Climbing the stairs finds you in the second lounge zone, with provision for a wet bar and double doors leading to the outside roof terrace. Finally the third, incomplete floor is ideal for a home theatre or fifth bedroom.
Outside remains mostly unfinished but provides a driveway to rear shed with concrete floor and a decked entertaining area off the kitchen with drainage for an outside shower.
With further features such as spotted gum flooring, ducted heating and double insulation this home needs work but the foundations are there. Just strap on your tool belt and get ready to add the final touches to this rare find!

Description:
Under Contract In 14 Days
It just doesn't get much better than this for first home buyers or couples looking to downsize.
Positioned on a magnificent corner block of approx 648m2 (approx) this charming weatherboard home features a master bedroom with large walk in robe and ensuite, further two bedrooms with built in robes, spacious lounge room, open plan dining and kitchen with a wonderful outlook to the garden and outdoor undercover entertaining area.
Additional features include a double carport, polished timber floors and ducted evaporative cooling. The rear yard features a small maintenance free garden with garden shed.
Location is great with it only being a short stroll to Crib Point shops, schools and transport. This property isn't going to hang around long, so don't delay your call.

Description:
Beautifully Presented Large Family Home On Almost 1/4 Acre Allotment
This stunning and very street appealing home is positioned beautifully just across from the Stony Point Beach. Offering tranquillity, and abundance of space both inside and out this well presented home with three bedrooms, (master with WIR and ensuite) will totally impress you upon stepping out of the car. Stencil paved driveway leads to a double garage. Bay windows surround the home which allows for ample light and also the magical gardens are seen from every window. There is central ducted heating and cooling. Designed for functional living with separate zone formal and informal living areas plus rumpus room, adjoining the family/meals area is the kitchen with overhead cupboards and a large island bench. Also from the family/meals area you can access the large outdoor area with stencil pavement which also continues through to the gazebo. To complete the package the home is surrounded by beautiful gardens and a large private backyard for the kids to enjoy. Representing superb value on a high profile allotment of approx 926m2, this home is currently tenanted until the 14th of March 2014, returning $1,560 PCM ($360 PW,) with arguably the best tenants you can possibly have. To inspect this home please call Exclusive Agent Wilma Green on 0407 833 996.

Description:
"PARK LIKE SETTING ON A HUGE 1619m2 BLOCK"
A stunning country property tucked away lays this beautiful well kept family home on approx 1611m2 allotment. Offering leafy tranquility, an abundance of space both inside and out this light and airy three bedroom (master with WIR and ensuite) charming home will certainly impress on inspection. There is a central ducted gas log fire heating, 9 ft ceiling throughout with 9ft 6 in formal lounge. Designed for functional living the formal lounge has lovely French doors that lead out to the park like setting, a feature brick wall with leadlight windows is just another feature in the home. Adjoining the family/meals area is the stunning timber kitchen with overhead cupboards and ample bench space, to add to the beauty of the kitchen is a large servery window that accesses the outdoor entertaining area, which also looks out to the private gardens which any chief of the house will enjoy cooking up a treat in. Outside boasts sealed driveway, single carport, access to the very functional powered workshop, with all shelving to stay, a large private secure backyard for the kids to enjoy. Representing superb value on a high profile allotment of approx 1619sm2 with potential subdivision (STCA.)
Please call Exclusive Agent Wilma Green on 0407 833 996 to arrange an inspection.

Description:
SOLAR ENERGY EFFICIENT, AFFORDABLE FAMILY HOME ON A LARGE ALLOTMENT!
Don't let this pass you by, this light filled 3 bedroom B/V home situated at the end of a quiet country lane has many features that an astute purchaser is looking for. The formal lounge is separate from the family/meals area which adjoins the kitchen. The owners have taken advantage of the northley aspect and recently installed 4.2KWatt solar panels to reduce the ever increasing power bills. Outside boasts, D/B carport with access to rear through to a hair studio which could be easily converted to a office/ art studio with power and water, there is also another storage shed of approx 6m x 6m with concrete, power and water and another garden shed with concrete, lean too for boat or caravan storage and a very impressive dog run to keep the dogs away from the children while playing in this lovely big backyard. An outdoor paved pergola area that is very private for entertaining. All this on approx 1000sqmt allotment surrounded by lovely established gardens and as "Neat as a Pin"! Contact Exclusive Agent Wilma Green on 0407 833 996.

Description:
Under Offer
This unique home has a feel that can't be replicated and is sure to wow all who inspect. With soaring ceilings, exposed timber and timeless appeal makes this large home well suited to all families, couples, holiday makers and anyone after that ideal place to call home. Comprising: 4 bedrooms with ensuite off master, open plan kitchen, meals and lounge, upstairs retreat, central bathroom, side drive to genuine 4 car garage with bathroom/huge workshop, landscaped garden and a rear studio currently used for art. Special features include: claw foot bath, wood fire heater, a unique open plan design, loads of natural light with an outdoor aspect from every room and a classic mud brick finish. Close to public transport, local shops & schools, minutes drive to Somers beach and some of the Peninsula's leading wineries and great freeway access for a short trip to town. A must see!
